column3: If it failed to download the file, you could retry it again. That's just a temporary connection issue.

@ken2812221, I have this issue systematically with that source (dl.bintray.com). 
No problems with others. I think is network related, but could affect also other people.
We cannot assume that everybody in the world has the best network connection...
For this reason I suggest to increase the timeout value.
utACK e7a72455fa4d5c5b1a37ceae1ec557354b3009c2\n\nNo harm in bumping the timeout a bit :-)
